articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits State Industrial Art Exhibition
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits State Industrial Art Exhibition
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK, went round the venue of the State Industrial Art Exhibition now under way at the State Industrial Art Centre to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The newly-built State Industrial Art Centre has rooms for creation and offices where all departments of the Korean Industrial Art Studio, the Korean Industrial Art Information Exchange Agency and the Central Industrial Art Guidance Bureau can work.
					
					 The State Industrial Art Exhibition is due to open with splendor at the State Industrial Art Centre to mark the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung under the sponsorship of the Central Industrial Art Guidance Bureau and the Central Committee of the Artists Union of Korea.
					
					 He went round various places of the venue of the exhibition for hours prior to its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 He was briefed on the construction of the State Industrial Art Centre.
					
					 He highly praised the soldier-builders for having successfully built a modern creating center and extended thanks to them.
					
					 At the ground floor of the exhibition hall he saw with keen attention more than 1 700 designs and data of various kinds created in the field of industrial art under the direct guidance of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu up to this date from the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He dropped in at the first floor of the exhibition hall where he saw one by one at least 1 000 designs and products of various kinds created by the Korean Industrial Art Studio, industrial art studios in each province, industrial art creation units of ministries and national institutions and teachers and students in the field of education including Pyongyang University of Fine Art and industrial art amateurs.
					
					 He gave precious instructions for developing the nation's industrial art as required by the new century.
					
					 He said that drawing trademarks to be vivid and truthful like caricatures would be worth watching, attract people's eyes and arouse their curiosity about products.
					
					 It is necessary to successfully conduct publicity work about industrial art and positively promote it so that people may have proper understanding of it and show deep interest in it, he said.
					
					 He underscored the need to widely introduce the excellent industrial art of the country through interviews, visits and exchanges with other countries as there appeared the comprehensive State Industrial Art Centre.
					
					 He expressed hope that the industrial art creators and amateurs would produce better and more successful designs and products in the future.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Jae Il and Pak Pong Ju, first vice department directors of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits People's Theater Nearing Its Completion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits People's Theater Nearing Its Completion
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the People's Theater nearing its completion.
					 Going round the inside and outside of the theatre for hours, he learned in detail about the construction.
					
					 The plan of building the theatre was in the mind of general secretary Kim Jong Il from some ten years ago and it was a project particularly favored by him even during the last moments of his life, Kim Jong Un said, adding with pleasure that now we have carried out one of the behests of the leader, who had always been thinking about building the best theatre for the Korean people.
					
					 The theatre is new and peculiar in the architecture and content and immaculate in all from its design to the construction, the supreme commander said, adding that Kim Jong Il would have been very much pleased if he had seen the theatre that has been built as a grand edifice since he had devoted all his life to the people.
					
					 Calling the People's Theatre an excellent cultural and arts seat in the Songun era which can be boasted for its elegant and majestic harmony, elaboration and modernity, the supreme leader expressed great satisfaction. He said now it has become possible to hand down to posterity another valuable treasure indicative of the tradition of the Juche-oriented arts.
					
					 He highly estimated the feats performed by soldier builders who took charge of the project, and extended thanks to them.
					
					 He called for actively exploring and designing new, original and peculiar architecture so as to build more structures suited to the feelings of the Koreans and their aesthetic desire. He also called for effecting steady renovation in the formative and artistic representation of architectural buildings.

articles.title: Round-table Talks between KCST Officials and Foreign Space Experts and Reporters Held
articles.content:
Round-table Talks between KCST Officials and Foreign Space Experts and Reporters Held
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks between officials of the Korean Committee for Space Technology (KCST) and foreign experts in the field of space science and technology and reporters from various countries were held at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Tuesday as regards the DPRK's planned first application satellite launch.
					 The vice director of the Space Development of the Committee said:
					
					 Kwangmyongsong-3, which is to be launched under the DPRK government's policy on space development for peaceful purposes, is an earth observation satellite for collecting data essential for the country's economic development.
					
					 The satellite is to be blasted off southward by carrier rocket Unha-3 from Sohae Satellite Launching Station in Cholsan County, North Phyongan Province. It will go along the solar synchronous orbit at 500km altitude.
					
					 As seen through Sunday visit to the launching station, the satellite assembly and other preparations are in the process.
					
					 We chose safe trajectory so that the carrier rocket debris to be caused after its launch do not affect neighboring countries and regions. We also informed international organizations and surrounding regions of falling points in line with international regulations and practices.
					
					 Experienced space scientific and technological experts and journalists from around the world were invited to visit the Sohae Satellite Launching Station where they saw the satellite, a launch pad with the carrier rocket in position and the General Launch Command Centre.
					
					 They will also visit the General Satellite Control and Command Center in Pyongyang and watch in a safe place the launch of Kwangmyongsong-3.
					
					 Through the satellite launch we will contribute to promoting international confidence and strengthening cooperation and exchange in space scientific researches and in the field of satellite launch.
					
					 The officials of the Committee answered questions raised by reporters.
					
					 The participants swapped views on a series of matters of mutual concern as regards the DPRK government's space scientific researches and scientific and technological satellite launches for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: 19th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
19th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place Monday at the April 25 House of Culture to mark the 19th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People’s Army and the Korean People’s Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, persons of distinguished services, labor innovators and other working people.
					
					 All the participants observed a moment’s silence in memory of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Vice Marshal and Chief of the KPA General Staff Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman was a historic event of epochal turn in developing the DPRK and accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 His election provided the army and people of the DPRK with a sure guarantee for carrying forward the President's ideas and exploits on building national capabilities for self-defence and carrying out the party's line on state-building in the Songun era as well as glorifying the eternal future of Kim Il Sung's Korea. 
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun politics and Songun revolutionary strategy, the DPRK could turn into the world's military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and its army and people could win victories in the political and military standoff with all aggression forces including the U.S. imperialists, who style themselves the world's super power, and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					
					 The DPRK has become a country capable of manufacturing and launching satellites. And solid foundations have been laid for realizing the people's wishes and providing them with a highly civilized life including Juche-oriented production systems, up-to-date machine building industry and modern production bases. This is a shining fruition of the great devotion and persevering efforts made by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He consistently adhered to the policy of the country’s reunification and foreign policy based on the Songun politics of national independence and patriotism, ushered in the June 15 era of reunification which advances in the idea of “By our nation itself” and remarkably enhanced the international prestige and influence of the DPRK.
					
					 He perfectly solved the issue of succession to the leadership. This is the greatest feat he performed for the prosperity of                Kim Il Sung's Korea and the eternal happiness of its people.
					
					 The leadership of Kim Jong Un is a decisive guarantee for successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation that was pioneered by the President and victoriously led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are firmly convinced of the bright future of Songun Korea in the outstanding ideology, leadership and noble virtue of Kim Jong Un who is leading the drive to effect a fresh revolutionary surge in all fields of the revolution and construction including politics, military affairs, economy and culture.

articles.title: Grand Banquet Given by WPK Central Military Commission and DPRK NDC

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Mosaics portraying smiling President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il were erected on Jangdae Hill in Pyongyang.
					 51m in length and 16.6m in height, the mosaics depict the peerlessly great men blessing Songun Korea with a rosy future, with magnolias in the background.
					
					 At the bottoms there are letters reading "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us".
					
					 The erection of these mosaics for the first time in the history of the country helped the desire of the army and people of the DPRK to glorify the undying feats of the great persons born of Mt. Paektu for all ages to be realized.
					
					 The surrounding areas of the mosaics have been spruced up.
					
					 A ceremony of unveiling the mosaics took place on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Premier Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Mun Kyong Dok, secretary of the Central Committee of Workers' Party of Korea who is chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, and people from all walks of life, more than 60 000 in all.
					
					 Placed before the mosaics were floral baskets in the name of party and power bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, co-op farms, schools, etc. in the city.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Mun Kyong Dok said the mosaics of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il erected in Pyongyang before any other place were a great honor, pride and the greatest fortune of the citizens.
					
					 This auspicious event could take place thanks to the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who opened a new chapter in accomplishing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leaders with noble loyalty and moral obligation, Mun added.
					
					 He called on the people to give a steady continuity to the history of perpetuating the memory of the leaders with a firm conviction that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always be with them.

articles.title: Commemorative Coins to Be Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
Commemorative Coins to Be Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will issue commemorative coins in honor of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 A decree on issuing the coins was released on Monday by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 Commemorative coin "100th Anniversary of Birth of Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" will be minted in gold and silver. 
					
					 Depicted in the center of the coins will be the portrait of a smiling Kim Il Sung with letters "Birth of Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" in their upper part and "1912-100th Anniversary-2012" in their lower part.
					
					 The portrait is flanked by decorative laurels with a hundred points rimming the coin meaning the 100th anniversary. 
					
					 Engraved in the center of the tails is the President's old home in Mangyongdae with rays of the sun in the background as well as fineness and weight on their both sides.
					
					 The upper part has carved letters reading "Central Bank of the DPRK" and the lower part the year of minting. 
					
					 The gold coin is 40mm in diameter and 2.5mm in thickness while the silver one 45mm in diameter and 3.5mm in thickness.

articles.title: National Memorial Service for Choe Hyon Held
articles.content:
National Memorial Service for Choe Hyon Held
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service took place at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday to mark the 30th death anniversary of Choe Hyon, a revolutionary fighter.
					 Choe Hyon joined the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army in July 1932 after serving in the Red Guards. He rendered distinguished service in the history of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 After the country's liberation, he worked heart and soul for the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the building of the regular armed forces. In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War, he performed a great contribution to the victory in the war.
					
					 In the postwar period, he devotedly worked to consolidate the unity and cohesion of the party, accelerate socialist construction and hasten the country's reunification, holding important posts of the party, the state and the army.
					
					 He dedicated himself to the sovereignty and independence of the country and the happiness of its people and to the victory of the cause of socialism, following the road of revolution true to the wise leadership of the party and the leader. 
					
					 He died at the age of 74 on April 9, 1982. 
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, labor innovators, bereaved families and working people in the city. 
					
					 Minister of the People's Armed Forces KPA Vice Marshal Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his memorial address that Choe Hyon's whole life was a brilliant life of the Songun revolutionary fighter who devotedly defended the headquarters of the revolution with arms in the first line of the struggle, keeping in his mind the transparent revolutionary outlook on the leader. His life was also a worthwhile one of a genuine revolutionary who dedicated his all to the party and the revolution, the country and its people, he added. 
					
					 He was a paragon of the revolutionary soldier possessed of the truest and most transparent view and stand on upholding President Kim Il Sung, the leader of the revolution, and general secretary Kim Jong Il, he noted. 
					
					 The speaker called upon all the party members, servicepersons and people to carry forward the tradition of loyalty shown by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners, become a fortress and shield devotedly protecting the dear respected Kim Jong Un and make a positive contribution to developing the country's economy and settling the issues concerning the people's living.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Choe Hyon

Wreaths Laid before Bust of Choe Hyon

					 Seen before the bust was a wreath sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and O Kuk Ryol, officials of the party and armed forces bodies, ministries and national institutions, and media persons, servicepersons, bereaved families and other people in the city.
					
					 Laid before the bust were wreaths in the name of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, ministries, national institutions, media organs, units of the Korean People's Army, the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, etc. Bouquets were also placed before the bust.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyr.

articles.title: Choe Hyon, Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
articles.content:
Choe Hyon, Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Choe Hyon was one of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, who upheld the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with loyalty.
					 Born into a family of a soldier of the Independence Army, he set out on the road for the country's independence in his early years.
					
					 He witnessed the Independence Army units being defeated by the Japanese aggressor army and served a jail term.
					
					 After he was released from the prison, Choe joined the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army in July Juche 21 (1932), true to President Kim Il Sung's line on armed struggle.
					
					 It was in September 1933 when Choe first met Kim Il Sung. He began to admire Kim Il Sung as the sun of the nation and the sole leader of the revolution who was able to liberate Korea from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 Kim Il Sung placed deep trust in him for his bravery and strong sense of patriotism and cared so much for him.
					
					 As a commanding officer of a guerrilla unit, Choe risked his life in many battles against the Japanese aggressor army. 
					
					 He helped found the Korean People's Army after the country's liberation and played a big role in winning the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953), being active as the commander of a division and a corps.
					
					 After the war, he took important posts in the party, government and the army, making contributions to building up the national defence capability and defending the gains of the revolution by force of arms.
					
					He devoted all his mental and physical energies to establishing leader Kim Jong Il's guidance system in the army.
					
					 He was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung and the title of Hero of the DPRK and was a deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 Kim Jong Il took a measure to make films featuring Choe's life devoted to the cause of the party and the leader.
					
					 Choe Hyon passed away on April 9, 1982.

articles.title: New York KCNA-AP Photo Exhibition Widely Introduced
articles.content:
New York KCNA-AP Photo Exhibition Widely Introduced
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- KCNA-AP joint photo exhibition "Window on North Korea" is going on amid great interest.
					 It was opened in New York in mid March to mark the 100th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's birth.
					
					 Lots of media around the world including those in the U.S. introduced the photo exhibition since its opening.
					
					 The New York Times in its website said the photo of family members of the leader of the DPRK is very impressive.
					
					 Radio Tokyo also introduced the joint photo exhibition in its website, saying that photos of new leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un are also on the view.
					
					 Ronda Hauben, reporter at UN, posted on a website an article saying that the photo exhibition displays photos documenting daily life, important events and cultural achievements of the DPRK.
					
					 Since its opening the exhibition has been introduced by the ABC News of the U.S., websites News Tribune, Bradenton Herald, Huff Post, Monterey County The Herald, Local News, Ventura County Star and Deseret News, China News Service, ITAR-TASS of Russia, websites of Poland, Germany, Japan and other countries and regions.
					
					 They gave special write-ups on the exhibition including photos of smiling Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and other photos.
					
					 The exhibition is a clear proof of broad understanding and sympathy of the world progressives with dignified Kim Il Sung's Korea, Songun Korea.
					
					 The exhibition goes on.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Ugandan Personage
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Ugandan Personage
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday met and had a talk with Hyuha Samali Dorothy, deputy secretary general of the Uganda National Resistance Movement. The deputy secretary general is on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the World Congress on the Juche Idea.
					 The deputy secretary general said the Uganda National Resistance Movement has been emboldened by the achievements made by the WPK under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Expressing full support for Korea's peace and reunification, the deputy secretary general said the Uganda National Resistance Movement would always firmly stand by the WPK and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The Movement will expand exchanges with the WPK, the deputy secretary general added.

articles.title: Second-phase Reclamation of Kwaksan Tideland Completed: KCNA Report
articles.content:
Second-phase Reclamation of Kwaksan Tideland Completed: KCNA Report
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The KCNA made a detailed report on the completion of the second-phase reclamation of the Kwaksan Tideland located in the west coastal area of Korea.
					 According to the report, those engaged in the reclamation of the tideland on Taegye Islet finished the second-phase reclamation of the Kwaksan Tideland covering 1,600 hectares in a matter of one and half years.
					
					 Wa, Jang, Talyang, Woejang, Naejang and other islets in the sea were linked with the land by breakwaters extending thousands of meters, turning the tideland left barren under rough waters for thousands of years into a huge socialist farm and fish farm that bring happiness to the people.
					
					 The above-said reclamation was a vast project to carry more than 1.1 million cubic meters of earth and over 440,000 cubic meters of stones to build ten breakwaters and do at least 190 000 square meters of stonework. This project had to be carried out in more unfavorable topographic conditions and environment as compared with the preceding projects.
					
					 The builders launched the project in August 2010, making a signal leap forward from the first drive for damming waters to build breakwaters Nos. 1 and 10.
					
					 The land and several islets were completely linked till the Day of the Sun last year and the project for the first damming to build breakwater No. 7 was completed on August 23 of the same year.
					
					 The project for the first damming in all sections of all breakwaters was completed except breakwater No. 6, making a breakthrough in the project.
					
					 With the section between breakwaters getting closer, the water pressure increased and the water current gained in speed. However, the last section of breakwater No. 6 was successfully dammed off and the rush of sea water into the tideland stopped thanks to the indomitable will and heroic self-sacrificing spirit of the builders.
					
					 Another trial befell the builders when they completed the project for the first damming in the whole section of breakwater in November 2011.
					
					 The breakwater burst out due to the worst tsunami in hundreds of years, but they did not yield to it.
					
					 None of the builders left the work sites. They finally wound up  46,000 square meters of  stonework for breakwaters Nos. 2, 3, 4, 5 and 8 till the end of last year.

articles.title: Photo, Book Exhibition Opens to Mark World Congress on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Photo, Book Exhibition Opens to Mark World Congress on Juche Idea 
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The International Preparatory Committee and the DPRK Preparatory Committee for the World Congress on the Juche Idea opened a photo and book exhibition of the World Congress "Comrade Kim Il Sung, eternal sun of Juche" in their joint name. An opening ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday. 
					 On display there are books and photos of the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and those of worldwide activities to study and disseminate the idea. 
					
					 There are photos documenting the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who provided the Songun revolutionary leadership together with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Thae Hyong Chol, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, Kim Chang Ryong, vice-chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and officials concerned. Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who is secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea also attended. 
					
					 Speeches were made. 
					
					 Kim Ki Nam expressed conviction that the exhibition will inspire the army and people of the DPRK advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and make contributions to strengthening unity, cooperation and solidarity among the world progressives and Juche idea followers who love justice and peace.
					
					 Vishwanath said the Juche idea founded by the President was developed in depth by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called on the world progressives to victoriously advance the human cause of independence under the banner of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Art Festival to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Art Festival to Be Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The April Spring Friendship Art Festival will take place in Pyongyang to mark President Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary (April 15), the Day of the Sun.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Tong Kyong Su, an official of the preparatory committee for the festival.
					
					 The official said:
					
					 The preparatory committee is now operating at the Pyongyang International House of Culture.
					
					 The festival, with independence, friendship and peace as its theme, will promote exchanges and cooperation among artistes from across the world.
					
					 Pyongyang, the capital of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is now open to foreign and overseas Korean artistes, desirous of joining the festival.
					
					 The chairman of the preparatory committee will address the inaugural ceremony, to be followed by hoisting of the festival flag.
					
					 At the ceremony Korean artistes will give a congratulatory performance, directed by a renowned foreign conductor. 
					
					 The festival will be divided into group, separate and joint performances. The Pyongyang Grand Theatre, East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, Ponghwa Art Theatre and other modernly-equipped theatres are designated as venues for the festival.
					
					 Classical musical numbers will be performed exclusively at the Moranbong Theater, Music Hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and the Yun I Sang Concert Hall.
					
					 It is undoubted that the DPRK National Symphony Orchestra will adorn the festival significantly.
					
					 The festival will also include circus performances.
					
					 On April 15, the festival participants will enjoy the day with Pyongyang citizens in Mangyongdae and other places in the city.
					
					 During the festival, they will also appreciate art performances given by the National Symphony Orchestra and Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe of the DPRK, which will give glimpse of the development of Korea's art.
					
					 A joint performance will be available at the closing ceremony, followed by a prize-awarding ceremony.
					
					 The April Spring Friendship Art Festival made its debut in Pyongyang in April Juche 71 (1982).

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Performs Undying Feats in Lifetime
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Performs Undying Feats in Lifetime
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung (Apr. 15), the Korean people and the world's progressives are recollecting undying feats and precious career of the peerless patriot and great statesman.
					
					Kim Il Sung authored more than 10,800 famous works.
						
					
					 He founded the immortal Juche idea with his extraordinary wisdom, thus opening up a new era of history.
					
					 He made public more than 10,800 celebrated works for nearly 70 years in his lifetime, 160 a year, or one in two or three days. This figure clearly proves that he was a genius of thought and theories. 
					
					 Tens of millions of copies of his works have been published in 60 odd languages in more than 110 countries up till now.
						
					
					Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" is an eternal national treasure.
						
					
					 Busy with engaging himself in revolutionary activities, he wrote volumes of the reminiscences, reviewing his whole life.
					
					 Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of the reminiscences evoked a great sensation as a monumental encyclopedia, soon after it was published.
					
					 Published in 20 languages in tens of countries, the book has swept more than 170 countries.
					
					 It encourages the Korean and other people across the world in their struggle for independence of the popular masses.
						
					
					Kim Il Sung traveled long journey of field guidance.
						
					
					 He gave field guidance to more than 20,600 units in his lifetime since Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, which took 8,650 days.
					
					 The course of his field guidance tour extends more than 578,000 km. This distance equals to 301 rounds of double trips from Mt. Paektu to Mt. Halla in Korea and 14 rounds of earth.
					
					 In a word, the life of the President was characterized by ardent patriotism and devoted efforts for the people's happiness.

articles.title: Colorful Events Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Colorful Events Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A state book exhibition was opened at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday in celebration of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in the venue are at least 30,000 publications of more than 20,000 kinds published in the DPRK and other countries including works of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The exhibition is divided into wings of various publishing houses and distribution.
					
					 On display in the wing of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House are "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works", the President's reminiscences "With the Century" and short biographies and biographies dealing with the revolutionary careers of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and their leadership feats, books on their greatness such as "Among the People" and socio- political books.
					
					 Various other publishing houses showcase books telling about the feats of the peerlessly great persons, different kinds of teaching materials and reference books, magazines dealing with knowledge and common senses in different fields, dictionaries and picture albums.
					
					 Displayed in the wing of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan are books, magazines and textbooks dealing with the feats the great men performed by contributing to the strengthening and development of the movement of Koreans in Japan, and imbuing them with patriotism and the love for the nation.
					
					 On display in the wing of distribution are works published in different countries and books dealing with the personalities of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu as great persons and the achievements made by the DPRK in socialist construction.
					
					 This day witnessed an opening of a national fine art exhibition and state industrial art exhibition.
					
					 Displayed in the exhibition are at least 500 pieces of paintings such as Korean paintings, oil paintings, gem-powdered paintings and posters.
					
					 On display in the exhibition in chronological order are more than 1,700 designs and materials of various kinds created in the field of industrial art since the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 On display are over 1,000 designs and goods of diverse kinds created by the Korean Industrial Art Studio, provincial industrial art studios, industrial art creation groups of ministries and national institutions and teachers and students of Pyongyang University of Fine Arts and fine art lovers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Bolstering DPRK's Military Strength
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Bolstering DPRK's Military Strength
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- April 9 marked the 19th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Kim Jong Il began the Songun (military-first) leadership with his inspection of Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He prepared the KPA to be an army strong in ideology and faith, imbued with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of defending the socialist motherland.
					
					 He also turned it into an elite army, each soldier being a match for a hundred foes, equipped with latest weaponry.
					
					 He put forward the slogan "Training Is Also a Battle!" in the army. 
					
					 Always finding himself among servicepersons, he encouraged them to perform feats in defending the country.
					
					 He also paid deep attention to developing local ammunitions industry, and furnished the army with powerful offensive and defensive means.
					
					 Meanwhile he strengthened the militia forces to build up the all-people and nationwide defence system. 
					
					 DPRK servicepersons and civilians pay respects to Kim Jong Il for having defended socialism and upgraded the country's prestige through Songun leadership.

articles.title: Korean People's Highest Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Korean People's Highest Tribute to Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on awarding Order of Kim Il Sung to leader Kim Jong Il was announced Monday.
					 Kim Jong Il wisely guided the Workers' Party of Korea, servicepersons and people for scores of years, thus performing undying feats for the country and people, the times and history.
					
					 He saw to it that Kim Il Sung was held in high esteem as the eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, thereby setting a noble example of perpetuating the memory of the leader without precedent in the world's history of politics. 
					
					 While giving priority to military affairs, Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power and a nuclear state, as well as a satellite manufacturing and launching state.
					
					 On the basis of the self-supporting national economy, he energetically pressed ahead with the industrial revolution in the new century to pave the way for building an economic power.
					
					 Meanwhile, he provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, the keynote of which is to achieve the national reunification by the Koreans themselves, stirring up the atmosphere for reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 And, he had energetically propelled the global socialist movement and the human cause of independence under the banner of independence and justice.
					
					 The awarding represented the unanimous will of all the Korean people, and it is their highest tribute to him.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was awarded this order already in 1978, 1982 and 1992.
					
					The order was instituted in 1972.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (24)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (24)
　　　Kim Il Sung's Feat for Continuity of Revolutionary Cause of Juche
					
					 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung had wisely guided all the Korean people to remain faithful to general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It was his steadfast will to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, started in Mt. Paektu, by force of arms.
					
					 With the President's intention and the unanimous wishes of the entire party and army and all the people, Kim Jong Il was acclaimed as the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army on December 24, Juche 80 (1991).
					
					 He was also elected chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on April 9, 1993.
					
					The President had used to praise Kim Jong Il as the greatest man in the world and called on all the Korean people to remain loyal to his leadership. He personally wrote a poem dedicated to the leader on his 50th birthday.
					
					 He gave priority to strengthening the Workers' Party of Korea into vanguard ranks faithful to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In his speech "The Fundamental Guarantee for Victory in the Revolution Is to Strengthen the Party and Enhance Its Leadership Role", made at the banquet in celebration of the 45th birthday of the WPK in October 1990, he called on all the party organizations and members to remain loyal to the leadership of the WPK Central Committee. 
					
					 And he comprehensively elaborated on the greatness of Kim Jong Il's ideas, leadership ability and personality in "For Carrying Forward and Accomplishing the Socialist Cause", his talks to the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and sons and daughters of revolutionary martyrs in March 1992 and January and March 1993.
					
					 The President attended a meeting of Korean intellectuals in December 1992, encouraging them to uphold the leadership of     Kim Jong Il and reliably defend and glorify socialism with knowledge and technology.
					
					 In his letter to the 8th Congress of the League of Socialist Working Youth of Korea, he stressed the need for all the young people to be united as one in mind around the leader in order to creditably accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 When meeting officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and compatriots from Japan in September 1993, he called for conducting the patriotic drive of Koreans in Japan as intended by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In this way the President provided a decisive guarantee for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and eternal prosperity of the nation by perfectly ensuring the continuity of leadership.

articles.title: New Strain of Flower Cultivated
articles.content:
New Strain of Flower Cultivated
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Floriculture Institute has cultivated a new strain of flower.
					 It is a perennial flowering plant that belongs to cymbidium lillian stewart. 
					
					 This plant is 50-60 cm high and its flower stalk 45-50 cm high. It brings out 10-15 racemes. 10-11 cm in diameter, a blossom has three calyxes and three petals. One of the petals is labiate.
					
					 The flower has a light pink color with purplish tints spotted, and comes into bloom for three months, starting in December.
					
					 Resistant to 5 degrees C and 30 degrees C, it can be easily cultivated.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un saw the flower and named it Manbokia.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Media Accused of Misleading Public Opinion
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Media Accused of Misleading Public Opinion
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement on April 7 accused the conservative media of using its vice-chairman's condolatory visit to Pyongyang for fabricating "the north wind".
					 The conservative media are going reckless to mislead public opinion over Ro Su Hui's condolatory visit to the north in the run-up to the "National Assembly" election, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Chosun Ilbo asserted that Ro's return home should not be allowed  and talked nonsense that it was skeptical about "what role he was supposed to play in the solidarity of opposition forces and what was the real purpose of his visit to the north." 
					
					 The statement assailed other conservative media for linking Ro's visit to the solidarity of the opposition camp, echoing Chosun Ilbo's claim. It also ridiculed Ri Hun Gun, chief vice-spokesman for the "Saenuri Party" who made much fuss, urging an opposition party to clarify its stand on Ro's visit.
					
					 This is, in the final analysis, a campaign to build up public opinion linking the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and opposition parties to the north by setting conservative media in motion, the statement noted. 
					
					 The organization will conduct a more dynamic movement for reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" and punish Lee Myung Bak, the "Saenuri Party" of Park Geun Hye and their mouthpiece Chosun Ilbo and other conservative media, it declared.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Liberal Democratic Party of Russia published in booklet President Kim Il Sung's work "Young People Must Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Upholding the Leadership of the Party".
					 The work, published on February 22 in 1993, clarifies the idea that young Koreans have successfully played the role of vanguard of the revolution. It also indicates the tasks and ways for carrying forward the Korean revolution through generations.
					
					 The book releasing ceremony took place at a university of Russia on April 3.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- AKP of Cambodia issued a commemorative bulletin on April 2 in the run-up to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun.
					 The news agency said in the bulletin:
					
					 Kim Il Sung made great contributions to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence. He enjoyed distinguished prestige in the world political circle and deep reverence from the progressive people.
					
					 The works published by the President through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities serve as a precious ideological pabulum and inspiring banner for the political and public figures and progressive people of many countries across the world.
					
					 During his lifetime he met a total of more than 70,000 foreigners including party, state and government heads of 136 countries and rendered material and moral assistance to the national liberation struggle, the anti-imperialist struggle and the building of a new society in many countries.
					
					 He put forward the idea of realizing global independence and made sure that the world people advocating independence struggled against imperialism in firm unity. He also greatly contributed to strengthening the socialist movement as well as the non-aligned movement.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia and Bangkok of Thailand on March 31 and April 2.  They were to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the 19th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 80th anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army. 
					 Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, made a report titled "Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary is a holiday of progressive humankind". He lauded Kim Il Sung for developing the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Vadim Kudimin, chairman of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Il Sung's Works, noted President Kim Il Sung scientifically clarified the theory of the issue of carrying forward revolution through generations. This is one of the feats performed by the President, he said.
					
					 As the issue of carrying forward the cause of the revolution has been successfully solved in the DPRK, a steady continuity is being given to the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he added. 
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said the President is a prominent leader not only of the Korean people but of the world people. 
					
					 "Studying for nearly 20 years the books on socialism and communism authored by famous thinkers and theoreticians, I was convinced that the Juche idea founded by the President is, indeed, the great idea most correctly reflecting the view of the popular masses," he said. "I became to know better about the validity and vitality of the Juche idea by witnessing great successes the DPRK registered in the socialist construction."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Army Building Feats Introduced by Nigerian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Army Building Feats Introduced by Nigerian Paper
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on March 28 carried a special write-up to mark 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The paper carried articles titled "General secretary Kim Jong Il and the Korean People's Army" and "Invincible might of the Korean People's Army would be unthinkable apart from leader Kim Jong Il". The articles said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forward the Korean People's Army (KPA) as the pillar of the self-defensive armed forces and made ceaseless inspections of KPA units.
					
					 He paid primary attention to increasing the political and ideological might of the KPA at all times and made sure that the education of soldiers in ideological awareness was strengthened so that they could have a strong will to defend the country, people and socialism at the risk of their lives.
					
					 He saw to it that the soldiers rounded off preparations to fight a modern war and that the defence industry was developed preferentially so that the KPA could be armed with modern and strong offensive and defensive means as well as a reliable war deterrent.
					
					 He also made sure that the KPA soldiers made a breakthrough in socialist construction.
					
					 A thriving nation is sure to emerge in socialist Korea as KPA makes breakthrough in building it and all the people are waging heroic struggle inspired by them.

articles.title: 100-Year History of Kim Il Sung's Korea: Indonesian Party
articles.content:
100-Year History of Kim Il Sung's Korea: Indonesian Party
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Pioneer Party of Indonesia issued a statement on April 3 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Korean people and the progressives the world over are now calling back with deep emotion on the 100-year history of Korea shining with the great august name of the President who made great contributions to the human cause of independence, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The President opened up a new era of Juche Korea and performed the undying feats which will go down in human history with his profound ideas and theories and gigantic revolutionary practices, being possessed of the outstanding leadership ability and noble virtue.
					
					 Also recorded in the history of Kim Il Sung's nation shining with victory and glory is the sacred revolutionary history of leader Kim Jong Il who led the Korean people along an ever-victorious path by inheriting the idea and leadership of the President.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and certainly achieve the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of national reunification, rallied close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Pyongyang Declaration Signed by Workers' Party of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Pyongyang Declaration Signed by Workers' Party of Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism" was signed by the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo on April 2.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre exposicion nacional de bellas artes industriales
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre exposicion nacional de bellas artes industriales
 Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, recorrio la Exposicion Nacional de Bellas Artes Industriales, montada en el Centro Nacional de Bellas Artes Industriales en celebracion del centenario del natalicio del Presidente          Kim Il Sung.
					 En el centro recien construido estan distribuidas las salas de creacion y las oficinas en que pueden laborar todas las secciones de la Creacion de Bellas Artes Industriales de Corea, la Agencia de Intercambio Informatico de Bellas Artes Industriales de Corea y la Direccion Central de Bellas Artes Industriales.
					
					 Sirve ahora de sede de la Exposicion Nacional de Bellas Artes Industriales en celebracion del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, coauspiciada por la Direccion Central de Bellas Artes Industriales y el Comite Central de la Union de Pintores de Corea.
					
					 Kim Jong Un recorrio largo tiempo varios puntos de la exposicion a punto de inaugurarse.
					
					 Sobre todo, escucho las explicaciones sobre la construccion del centro.
					
					 Expreso agradecimiento a los constructores militares evaluandolos altamente por la construccion magnifica de esa base de creacion conforme a la estetica moderna.
					
					 En el salon de exposicion del primer piso, el Comandante Supremo examino atentamente mas de mil 700 disenos y datos de distintos tipos, creados en el sector bajo la guia directa de los 3 generales del monte Paektu desde la epoca de lucha armada antijaponesa hasta la fecha.
					
					 En el salon del segundo piso, paso revista a mas de mil disenos y productos de distintos tipos creados por la Creacion de Bellas Artes Industriales de Corea, las mismas de las provincias, las unidades correspondientes de ministerios y organos centrales, los profesores y estudiantes del dominio docente, incluyendo la Universidad de Bellas Artes de Pyongyang, y los aficionados.
					
					 El maximo dirigente dio instrucciones valiosas que se presentan para desarrollar las bellas artes industriales a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					 Las marcas deben ser disenadas humoristica y animadamente para llamar la atencion de clientes y despertar la curiosidad de ellos por los productos que las lleven, dijo.
					
					 Hay que fomentar bien las bellas artes industriales mediante una campana de propaganda, de modo que la gente tenga correcta nocion de ellas y les preste profunda atencion, enseno.
					
					 Hace falta presentar y propagar ampliamente las excelentes bellas artes industriales de nuestro pais organizando muchas entrevistas, visitas e intercambio con otros paises en el Centro Nacional de Bellas Artes Industriales, apunto.
					
					 Finalmente, deseo que los creadores y aficionados a la rama creen en lo adelante tambien mejores disenos y productos. 
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il y Pak Pong Ju.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Teatro del Pueblo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Teatro del Pueblo
 Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, realizo la direccion en el terreno sobre el Teatro del Pueblo a punto de inaugurarse. 
					 El recorrio largamente el interior y el exterior del teatro enterandose en detalles del estado de construccion. 
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il pensaba en construir el Teatro del Pueblo desde hace mas de 10 anos y prestaba especial atencion a esa obra hasta en el ultimo periodo de su vida, recordo.
					
					 Complacido de la construccion magnifica del teatro, dijo que asi se pudo cumplir el legado del Dirigente de construir para el pueblo coreano el teatro mas excelente del mundo. 
					
					 El Teatro del Pueblo es novedoso y original en su forma arquitectonica y contenido y perfecto desde el diseno hasta la ejecucion, evaluo y dijo que se habria puesto muy satisfecho el Dirigente si hubiera visto esa creacion monumental para el pueblo al que el ofrendo todo lo suyo en toda su vida. 
					
					 El Teatro del Pueblo, que llega al climax de belleza moderna por la buena combinacion de elegancia, majestuosidad y fineza, es el excelente centro de cultura y arte de la era del Songun, apunto y se mostro muy contento de poder heredar a las generaciones venideras este patrimonio precioso que servira para llevar adelante el arte de tipo jucheano. 
					
					 El Maximo Dirigente evaluo de altos los meritos de los constructores militares y les expreso agradecimiento. 
					
					 Para construir mucho mas establecimientos arquitectonicos que convengan a la idiosincrasia y demanda estetica del pueblo coreano, es preciso buscar e inventar nuevos, originales y peculiares estilos de arquitectura y renovar constantemente su caracter plastico y artistico, concluyo.

articles.title: Acto por el 19o de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
articles.content:
Acto por el 19o de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
 Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 19o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, benemeritos, innovadores laborales y trabajadores. 
					
					 Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					 El informante senalo que la eleccion del Dirigente a la presidencia del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC fue un acontecimiento historico en el desarrollo de la RPDC y en el cumplimiento de la autoctona causa revolucionaria del Songun. 
					
					 Gracias a ese evento jubiloso, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC pudieron tener la firme garantia para llevar adelante la idea y las proezas del Presidente       Kim Il Sung por la construccion de autodefensa nacional, materializar consecuentemente la linea del Partido sobre la construccion del Estado en la era del Songun y glorificar generacion tras generacion a la Corea de Kim Il Sung, apunto el y continuo: 
					
					 La politica de Songun y la estrategia revolucionaria homonima del Dirigente permitieron convertir la patria en una potencia militar de talla mundial con armas nucleares, y el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos pudieron lograr victorias en la confrontacion politica y militar con los imperialistas norteamericanos, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos y otras fuerzas agresoras. 
					
					 La RPDC, fabricante y lanzador de satelites artificiales, tiene firmes bases para realizar los ideales del pueblo y la civilizacion como los autoctonos sistemas de produccion, la industria de maquinaria en el nivel sofisticado y modernas bases de produccion, lo cual es un noble fruto de los grandes esfuerzos mentales y fisicos del Dirigente. 
					
					 El Dirigente mantuvo invariablemente la politica exterior y la de reunificacion de la patria basadas en la politica de Songun, caracterizada por la independencia nacional y el amor por la patria y la nacion, de modo que se abriera la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio que avanza bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionles" y se elevara extraordinariamente la autoridad internacional y la influencia de la RPDC. 
					
					 La solucion satisfactoria del problema de sucesion de la direccion es la maxima proeza del Dirigente realizada por la prosperidad de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y la eterna felicidad del pueblo coreano. 
					
					 La direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un es la garantia decisiva para llevar a feliz termino generacion tras generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de construccion del Estado prospero socialista, iniciadas por el Presidente y conducidas victoriosamente por el Dirigente. 
					
					 Por ultimo, el informante destaco que los militares y civiles coreanos confian en el futuro maravilloso de la Corea del Songun viendo la extraordinaria idea y direccion y nobles virtudes de Kim Jong Un quien produce nuevo auge revolucionario en todos los sectores de la revolucion y la construccion como la politica, el area militar, la economia y la cultura.

articles.title: Acto central en memoria de Choe Hyon por 30o aniversario de su deceso
articles.content:
Acto central en memoria de Choe Hyon por 30o aniversario de su deceso
 Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central en memoria del combatiente revolucionario Choe Hyon por el 30o aniversario de su fallecimiento. 
					 Choe se incorporo en julio de 1932 a la Guerrilla Popular Antijaponesa despues de su militancia en la Guardia Roja y registro excepcionales meritos en la historia de la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa.
					
					 Despues de liberada Corea en 1945, trabajo infatigablemente por la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares, y en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), hizo gran aporte a la victoria del pueblo coreano en ella.
					
					 En el periodo posbelico, asumiendo importantes cargos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, lucho con abnegacion por fortalecer la unidad monolitica del partido, acelerar la construccion socialista y adelantar la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					 Lucho con el espiritu de sacrificio por la independencia de la patria, la felicidad del pueblo y la victoria de la causa socialista bajo la sabia direccion del partido y el lider y fallecio el 9 de abril de 1982 a la edad de 74 anos. 
					
					 En el acto central estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los benemeritos laborales, los familiares del martir y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares. 
					
					 El orador dijo que toda la vida de Choe fue la brillante y digna de combatiente del Songun y verdadero revolucionario quien con la firme concepcion revolucionaria del lider, defendio siempre en la primera linea y con armas a la Direccion de la Revolucion y dedico todo lo suyo por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					 El fue el prototipo de combatiente revolucionario que ha sido mas sincero y consecuente en apoyar al lider y al dirigente de la revolucion, senalo. 
					
					 Llamo a todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los civiles a hacerse baluarte y escudos para defender a riesgo de la vida al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, continuando la tradicion de fidelidad de los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses, y a contribuir a la solucion de problemas economicos y los otros relacionados con la vida del pueblo.
